title: AP rengar combo damage (just for fun)
body:
I know this build is terrible on the rift unless you do really well in lane, but it is always fun in aram and featured gamemodes so I'm gonna calculate his ap burst to see how much damage is done assuming lvl 18.

Battle Roar 170 + 0.8ap
Battle Roar empowered 250 +0.8ap
Savagery (130+150) + 0.5 ap (lichbane) + 83 (75% base ad)
Ludens echo 100 +0.1ap
Thunderlords Decree 180 + 0.1ap

= 170 + 250 + 83 + 100 + 180 = 783 magic damage
and 130 + 150 = 280 physical damage
and 0.8 + 0.8 + 0.1 + 0.1 + 0.5 = 2.3ap

Assuming 600 ap
783 + (600 * 2.3) = 1380 = 2163
and 280 physical damage
= 2443 damage

10.83% damage increase from masteries
assuming fully stacked bounty hunter passive
=2707 damage 90% magic'

bola excluded

but... a more realistic late game full build would be closer to 725 ap

783 + (725 *2.3) = 1667 + 783 = 2450
+ 280 physical damage

= 2730

*10.83% from masteries

= 3026 damage

Yes magic resist exists but you'd need at least 150 magic resist to at least half the damage after pen and you can pop banshee's with bola.
